head.citation-title: Adaptive Direct Fault-tolerant Control Design for Spacecraft Integrated Attitude and Orbit System航天器位姿运动一体化直接自适应容错控制研究
head.abstracts: © 2023 Science Press. All rights reserved.This paper proposes an adaptive direct fault-tolerant control method for the tracking spacecraft with actuator faults during proximity operations, to ensure the stability and the asymptotic tracking performance of the target spacecraft. Based on dual quaternion theory constructing the integrated spacecraft attitude and orbit control system, a nominal control signal is designed assuming that the faults are known; adaptive update laws are designed to estimate the unknown parameters in the nominal control signal to form the adaptive control law; and multiple Lyapunov functions are used to analyse the performance of the system with multiple actuator faults. Simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.

organization.$: Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics

coredata.dc:description: This paper proposes an adaptive direct fault-tolerant control method for the tracking spacecraft with actuator faults during proximity operations, to ensure the stability and the asymptotic tracking performance of the target spacecraft. Based on dual quaternion theory constructing the integrated spacecraft attitude and orbit control system, a nominal control signal is designed assuming that the faults are known; adaptive update laws are designed to estimate the unknown parameters in the nominal control signal to form the adaptive control law; and multiple Lyapunov functions are used to analyse the performance of the system with multiple actuator faults. Simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.
coredata.dc:title: Adaptive Direct Fault-tolerant Control Design for Spacecraft Integrated Attitude and Orbit System 航天器位姿运动一体化直接自适应容错控制研究
